summary: The Famous Attack From Dragonball Z comes to Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
The Ultimate Attack Based on the Dragonball Series

This Mod introduces a new Destruction Spell to the game: The Kamehameha

~~~

All versions have basically infinite range and can be fired with one or two hand

There are 4 versions available:
Spell Version - Drains 45 Magicka and does 75 Damage per second

Novice Spell Version - Drains 20 Magicka and does 30 Damage per second

Warrior Version - Drains 10 Stamina until stamina is depleted then drains 5 health per second and does 125 
Damager per second

Novice Warrior Version - Drains 5 Stamina until stamina is depleted then drains 3 health per second and does 63 Damager per second

~~~

To get the spell you\'ll need to travle to the \"Combat Crystal\" to the West of Riverwood (Already Marked on Map)

Once inside the Crystal you\'ll have to earn the spell by dispatching of custom enemies

It doesn\'t interfere with any mods that I know of (only adds a door and small crystal to Tamriel)

~~~~~~

A very special thanks to evernewjoy for all the extensive scripting help and general advice

Be sure to check out his stuff: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3469781

~~~~~~~

Known Bugs:

-People have reported crashing in some instances, if this happens try a different load game

-Sometime the book appears on the ground instead of the pedestal
author: EternalSelfCreation
